title: Invest and stake BinStarter upto 990% APY
body:
**Proposal for:** BinStarter

BinStarter is a decentralized insurance protocol which has a mining-style approval mechanism that brings together projects and liquidity providers.

### Technical details

- **Token Name:** BinStarter | BSR
- **Token Address:** 0xab287e6d370c61f105630e656b5468acb4d00423
- **Token Type:** Utility
- **Token Chain** Binance Smart Chain
- **Stage:** Launched
- **Link to the whitepaper:** https://binstarter.io/bsrdoc/BinStarter-Whitepaper-PDF.pdf
- **Team doxxed:** No
- **Smart contract public:** Yes
- **Audit:** Yes
- **Proof of Audit:** https://github.com/TechRate/Smart-Contract-Audits/blob/main/BinStarter%20Full%20Smart%20Contract%20Security%20Audit.pdf
- **LP Lock:** Yes
- **LP Lock proof:** https://bscscan.com/tx/0x05841ce6e8d2998caee5ad73dffa59be6af7ffd6bd8f6c779ac01e07fcfc8c4f

### Functional details

BinStarter has a different working structure than other platforms that provide solutions for IDO. Although BinStarter is considered as a decentralized structure, it is actually subject to approval with an "evaluation pool" and number of protocols.

It works in a structure similar to the mining system in bitcoin, inspired by the blockchain approval mechanism. So, what is the advantage of this structure? 

In decentralized structures, the control mechanisms are still not at a sufficient level, so project owners or liquidity providers may be damaged due to various reasons.

## Fund allocation and personal opinion

BinStarter can give us guaranteed access to IDO's based on the total holdings staked. The APY for staking is pretty huge, upto 990%. I'm proposing 3 different amounts based on the staking pool minimum allocation. I've invested myself in the seed sale (1 BNB total) and receiving 17 BSR daily staking rewards (approx 50-60 dollars, dependent on current token price). The staking rewards alone can be a nice passive income to expand our community investment wallet.

I made an example calculation with the minimum allocation per staking pool. As you can see the passive income can be very lucrative. My proposal is to buy 16000 BSR tokens for approx 50K and stake the tokens in pool 5. This will generate a passive income of approx $300 per day (with the current token price).

### Pool 4
- **Minimum allocation:** 8000 BSR (approx $25.000)
- **APY:** 420%
- **APR:** 165.24%
- **Daily Int:** 0.45% (8000/100*0.45 = 36 BSR = +/- $108)

### Pool 5
- **Minimum allocation:** 16000 BSR (approx $50.000)
- **APY:** 900%
- **APR:** 230.99%
- **Daily Int:** 0.63% (16000/100*0.63 = 100,8 BSR = +/- $300)

### Pool 6
- **Minimum allocation:** 32000 BSR (approx $100.000)
- **APY:** 990%
- **APR:** 239.66%
- **Daily Int:** 0.66% (32000/100*0.66 = 211,2 BSR = +/- $630)
author: 0x35B94F0e9aa2a93E1617eF54a586e1EdFe193a32
